availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William McKendry Sells (Bracken County, Kentucky tin smith and farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, tin smith and farmer. Ohio native. Son of Michel Sells and Mary Sells. Married to Mary Eliza Morford on November 6, 1851. Father of Susan Sells, Francis Sells, and Kathryn Sells. Tin Smith in Bracken County in 1860. Farmer in Bracken County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Augusta, p. 136.

Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film # 7020436, File #23723, Jefferson County, September 15, 1937 (accessed via ancestry.com).
